Name: Black Leggings
Description: Classic black leggings suitable for travel and daily wear, providing comfort and freedom of movement.

Name: Black Greaves
Description: Sturdy black greaves adorned with intricate patterns, bolstering your defenses in harsh battles.

Name: Black Chaps
Description: Wear-resistant black chaps designed for horse riding and long journeys in diverse terrains.

Name: Black Trousers
Description: Plain yet dependable black trousers offering moderate protection and comfort for everyday use.

Name: Black Breeches
Description: Elegant black breeches with fine embroidery, meant for courtly events and regal gatherings.

Name: Black Cuisses
Description: Embellished black cuisses featuring metal reinforcements, providing superior defense during intense combat.

Name: Black Poulaines
Description: Stylish black poulaines with pointed tips, showcasing a fashionable choice for noble occasions.

Name: Black Hose
Description: Snug-fitting black hose tailored for flexibility and grace during ceremonial events and dances.

Name: Black Leg Guards
Description: Rugged black leg guards endowed with mystical properties, enhancing vitality and resilience.
